channel.title: The Rob Redstone Show Podcasts

item.title: Austin Butler and Rob Redstone Talk it up!

item.description: http://twitter.com/RobRedstone Austin Butler and Rob Redstone talk about Aliens in the Attic, Ruby and The Rockits, Ashley Tisdale, filming in New Zealand, and his love life!

item.itunes:keywords: Austin Butler, Rob Redstone, Show, Aliens in the attic, Ruby and the rockits

item.title: Carter Jenkins talks Aliens In The Attic with Rob Redstone
item.itunes:author: Rob Redstone
item.dc:creator: Rob Redstone
item.description: Rob Redstone chats with Carter Jenkins from ‘Aliens In The Attic’ and has a complete blast! We cover all bases and leave no stone unturned so listen to this podcast and download and share it if you have to or even TWEET the heck out of it because it deserves to be heard!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Carter Jenkins dishes on Hollywood with Rob Redstone
item.itunes:summary: Rob Redstone chats with Carter Jenkins from ‘Aliens In The Attic’ and has a complete blast! We talk about Ashley Tisdale, Austin Butler, secrets of the production of Aliens In The Attic and Carters next movie!
item.itunes:keywords: carter, jenkins, rob, redstone, interview, aliens, in, the, attic, austin, butler, ashley, tisdale, show

item.itunes:summary: Rob and Romi Dames talk all about filming on the set Hannah Montana with Miley Cyrus, her acting career, comedy and her amazing voice-over work plus voices she hasnt done anywhere else! A MUST LISTEN!
item.itunes:keywords: Rob, Redstone, Romi, Dames, Hannah, Montana, Miley Cyrus, acting, comedy, voice-over

item.title: Nathan Kress Post KCA 2010 Interview iCarly
item.itunes:author: Rob Redstone
item.dc:creator: Rob Redstone
item.description: http://twitter.com/RobRedstone FOLLOW US! Insane INTRO! Nathan dishes on hosting KCA 2010! Talks KATY PERRY gets SLIMED! What CELEBS did Nathan meet for the FIRST time at KCA?? Nathan dishes bout his Kids Choice Awards ENCOUNTER w/ Robert Downey Jr in the BATHROOM! The after-Party! He discrines FAVORITE TV SHOW BLIMP! He talks Wizards of Waverly Place COMPETITION! Is Miranda Cosgrove\'s song \'KISSING YOU\' ABOUT NATHAN?? TECHNO MONTAGE TAKEOVER! CSI and Nathan\'s BAT BEAT-DOWN! Nathan discusses the ANTI-FREDDIE! Nathan dishes his CRAZY ROLE in CSI! Season 4 Will Freddie work at a BUILD-A-BRA? Will Nathan get HIS OWN SHOW? Nathan discusses the future direction of iCarly Season 4 and a possible recommendation to Dan Schneider! WILL HE SING LIVE in this PART, FIND OUT! Nathan describes his first KISS! His FEAR of MIMES! He answers: WILL HE HAVE HIS OWN SHOW?? A must see video! (Post KSA 2010)
item.itunes:subtitle: Nathan Kress Interview POST KCA\'s 2010
item.itunes:summary: http://twitter.com/RobRedstone FOLLOW US! Insane INTRO! Nathan dishes on hosting KCA 2010! Talks KATY PERRY gets SLIMED! What CELEBS did Nathan meet for the FIRST time at KCA?? Nathan dishes bout his Kids Choice Awards ENCOUNTER w/ Robert Downey Jr in the
item.itunes:keywords: Nathan Kress Interview iCarly movie nick tv show freddie benson CSI True Jackson VP the rob redstone jennette mccurdy kids choice awards 2010

item.title: MARMADUKE the Movie\'s Caroline Sunshine

item.description: http://twitter.com/RobRedstone FOLLOW US! Caroline Sunshine from MARMADUKE the Movie 2010 spills all the details of MARMADUKE The Movie! Marmaduke opens in US theaters June 4th, 2010. Marmaduke is directed by Tom Dey. Marmaduke Cast: Owen Wilson, Amanda Seyfried, Jeremy Piven, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Ron Perlman, Judy Greer, Anjelah Johnson, Lee Pace, Steve Coogan, William H. Macy, George Lopez, Damon Wayans Jr., David Walliams
